About me

My name is Nabila Rahma Diyanti, I was born in Bandung on August 20, 1998. I am is the first child of two brothers. I have completed my studies since 2023 and got bachelor degree in communication science in Garut University Faculty of Communication Sciences Public Relations Department or so-called Public relations (PR), since high school I have enjoyed organizing and socialize with others. Unknowingly my communication talent was attached and now it can be realized in the University. Starting from organizations on campus or outside campus, because I think adding relationships is very important to make things easier achieve a goal that we want, by organizing the ideas and our abilities can be honed so that we can create a result, be it in the form of work or activities that can involve a wide audience.

View Resume

Projects

Intern

A work can be created in various forms, even though we don't go deep into it. Being Head of the Artistic division has honed my leadership skills and creative talents. Costumes are important in art and add value to the team. I am entrusted with leading a project with a great team, producing work and helping the team become champions. The organization is a place to develop talents and abilities. It is a matter of pride to be Head of a Public Relations UKM at the Faculty, designing work programs involving Communication Science students and holding events such as webinars and competitions for high school students and university students.

Extern

I am a dynamic and dedicated individual, with extensive involvement in various external organizations aimed at honing my abilities and skills. One of them was as a member of Perhumas Muda Bandung, where I was involved in various activities focused on developing public relations and communication. In addition, my involvement in the National Narcotics Agency shows my commitment to important social issues, where I have contributed to various successful programs. Through these roles, I continue to learn and grow, and strive to make a positive impact in society.

Achievement

Have talent that can be channeled is a joy in itself especially in the field they are involved in. From so many events that I participated in such as Webinar MC and BNN in the city of Tasik Malaya, became Mc and Public Relations is a pride apart from that I am happy in that division I can hone my skills even more I am in the world of public speaking as well lobbying negotiations. Although this is not a masterpiece but this accomplishment is a benchmark for achievement in the future
